sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PSNL0999 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CHNG_BDTA_SEIL_NUM , CHNG_DT , CHNG_CD , CHNG_BFR_CTNT , CHNG_AFT_CTNT , PRCS_YN , CHNG_REAS_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #chngBdtaSeilNum# , #chngDt# , #chngCd# , #chngBfrCtnt# , #chngAftCtnt# , #prcsYn# , #chngReasCtnt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PSNL0999 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , CHNG_BDTA_SEIL_NUM=#chngBdtaSeilNum# , CHNG_DT=#chngDt# , CHNG_CD=#chngCd# , CHNG_BFR_CTNT=#chngBfrCtnt# , CHNG_AFT_CTNT=#chngAftCtnt# , PRCS_YN=#prcsYn# , CHNG_REAS_CTNT=#chngReasCtnt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CHNG_BDTA_SEIL_NUM=#chngBdtaSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PSNL0999 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CHNG_BDTA_SEIL_NUM=#chngBdtaSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CHNG_BDTA_SEIL_NUM , CHNG_DT , CHNG_CD , CHNG_BFR_CTNT , CHNG_AFT_CTNT , PRCS_YN , CHNG_REAS_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PSNL0999 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CHNG_BDTA_SEIL_NUM=#chngBdtaSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CHNG_BDTA_SEIL_NUM , CHNG_DT , CHNG_CD , CHNG_BFR_CTNT , CHNG_AFT_CTNT , PRCS_YN , CHNG_REAS_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PSNL0999 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , CHNG_BDTA_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PSNL0999 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
